r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d: A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP. It has support for HTTP transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: - When a connection attempt fails, have the method return 0. (danielc) - Move the protocol/port checking/switching and the property settings from sendPayloadHTTP10() to the XML_RPC_Client constructor. (danielc) - Add tests for setting the client properties. (danielc) - Remove $GLOBALS['XML_RPC_twoslash'] since it's not used. (danielc) - Bundle the tests with the package. (danielc)
